Uses of Interface
noppes.npcs.api.item.IItemScripted

Packages that use IItemScripted
Package
Description
noppes.npcs.api.event
This package contains event classes whose instances are dispatched to the corresponding hook functions (if present) in CNPC scripts.

  • Uses of IItemScripted in noppes.npcs.api.event

    IItemScripted
    ItemEvent.item
    The subject scripted item of the event.
